trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Table" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Table" /> 類型公開至 UI 自動化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Table" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Table" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Table" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Table" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer" /> 的控制項型別。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Table" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Table" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Table" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Table" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "Table".
trans-unit.target: 包含 "Table" 的字串。

trans-unit.source: A value from the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 列舉中的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Table" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Table" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer" /> 的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Grid" />, this method returns a <see langword="this" /> pointer; otherwise, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Grid" />，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="this" /> 指標，否則會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Table" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer" /> is understood by the end user as interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指出與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Table" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer" /> 會由使用者辨識為互動式，還是做為 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)] 中控制項的邏輯結構。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of columns in a grid.
trans-unit.target: 取得方格中的資料行總數。

trans-unit.source: The total number of columns in a grid.
trans-unit.target: 方格中的資料行總數。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The ordinal number of the row of interest.
trans-unit.target: 重要的資料列序號。

trans-unit.source: The ordinal number of the column of interest.
trans-unit.target: 重要的資料行序號。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the UI Automation provider for the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定儲存格的使用者介面自動化提供者。

trans-unit.source: The UI Automation provider for the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定儲存格的使用者介面自動化提供者。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of rows in a grid.
trans-unit.target: 取得方格的資料列總數。

trans-unit.source: The total number of rows in a grid.
trans-unit.target: 方格的資料列總數。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。
